entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
